concept.title: Rule Designer
concept.shortdesc: The Rule Designer is a module within the Designer Studio (DS) Workbench application. This designer is a product called Visual Rules, developed by Innovations Softwaretechnologie GmbH.

conbody.p: Visual Rules comes with its own set of documentation: Visual Rules Modeling Guide
The Design Studio documentation concerning the Rule Designer mostly focus on the specific usage made of Visual Rules.

p.note: The rule explorer presented in the DS Navigator is not fully functional. See section for details.
